name: WRESTLEBEARD
description:
This is the story of Wrestlebeard

The real atomic elbow of the seven seas

The scourge of evil beard pirate ghosts

The TL;DR of The Return Of The Obra Dinn

* * *

THE GHOSTS ARE TEARING HIS SHIP APART

GET RID OF THE HECKING GHOSTS

* * *

CONTROLS: 

WASD - Movement

Left Click: Pirate Punch

Right Click: Pirate Grapple

                  - While grappling: Left click to throw, right click to release

Shift - Sprint

* * *

MAKE SURE TO PLAY IN FULLSCREEN!

Oh, and here's the demo for CLAM MAN (in case the link at the end doesn't work)

Follow us on twitter!

The track "Royal Entrance" made by Visager
